scene_description_enriched: A crowned female figure, identified as a saint, stands holding an open book in her left hand and a sword in her right, which is planted point-down in the ground. She wears a mantle over a patterned tunic and a diadem. The background is filled with a dotted pattern, suggesting a stylized interior or a symbolic space. Above her, an architectural element resembling an arch with decorative tracery frames the scene. The presence of the book and sword are common attributes of saints, particularly martyrs.
